DOC.brief_title: Study Long-Acting Acetaminophen Postoperative Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Must least 17 less 46 year age Must weigh least 100 lbs body mass index least 18 less 30 Scheduled undergo surgical extraction one impacted third molar low jaw . The third molar upper jaw side may also remove . Experiencing moderate severe pain extraction third molar . Can allergic acetaminophen ( Tylenol ) nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( e.g. , Motrin , Advil , Aleve , Naproxen ) .
